tasks.title: Create Login Page
tasks.info: Develop a user login page that accepts email and password, verifies user credentials, and grants access to authorized pages.

tasks.title: Implement User Dashboard
tasks.info: Develop a user dashboard that displays user profile, account settings, and other relevant information in a user-friendly interface.

tasks.title: Integrate Payment Gateway
tasks.info: Integrate a payment gateway into the platform that enables users to make secure online payments for products or services.

tasks.title: Develop User Analytics
tasks.info: Develop a user analytics dashboard that tracks user behavior and provides insights into user engagement, retention, and other relevant metrics.

tasks.title: Implement Social Sharing
tasks.info: Implement social sharing functionality that allows users to share platform content on social media platforms like Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram.

tasks.title: Improve Site Speed
tasks.info: Optimize platform performance to improve site speed and reduce page load times.
